titleStmt.title: The Mall, or, The modish lovers a comedy : acted by His Majesties servants.
titleStmt.author: Dryden, John, 1631-1700.
J. D. (John Dover), 1644?-1725.

notesStmt.note: Dedication signed: J.D., hence the play has been ascribed to Dryden, but bears little resemblance to his work.
Also attributed to John Dover. Cf. MacDonald, H. John Dryden.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
